poster: F T H    S K Y
title: Na to Oce server
body:
Anyone know why we can't change to different server now?  I remember we can buy the item in the shop, but cant find now. 
Thank you

replies.body: Server transfers are still down for some technical issues, but it looks like the latest update from [**HollyMonster **](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/rlu6awv4-transfer-service-update) was mentioning that it might be early 2018 before they are back.
there are some technical issues right now,  the plan was to release it back on 20th November,  but it is still in maintenance.
